title.bibl: The Chicago Times, Localisms, December 10, 1872 [Welsh Language to be Discussed]

div.bibl: The Chicago Times, Localisms, December 10, 1872 [WELSH LANGUAGE TO BE DISCUSSED]

body.p: The ladies of the Welsh Congregational Church give an oyster supper this evening in the rooms usually occupied by the Cambrian Literary Society. On this account the regular weekly public meeting of the Society has been postponed until Tuesday evening, the 17th, on which occasion the question, “Is the maintenance of the Welsh language a hindrance to the social advancement of the Welsh people?” will be discussed. The exercises will be varied with music and speeches on various subjects.
